physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 22; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file concerns Lieutenant-Colonel Basil Woods Ballard and his position as the Sultanate of Muscat and Oman's Minister for Foreign Affairs.The correspondence mainly discusses the possibility of Woods Ballard being considered for a position as Financial Adviser in the Government of Kuwait. Following news that the Kuwait position has been filled, the correspondence goes on to discuss arrangements for the extension of Woods Ballard's current contract. It also covers travel and leave arrangements.Notable correspondents include the following: Basil Woods Ballard; the Political Agent and Consul, Muscat; the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf; the Foreign Office.
